scripts.prepdf: mkdir -p fonts && wget -O fonts/RobotoCondensed.zip https://github.com/googlefonts/roboto-3-classic/releases/download/v3.012/Roboto_v3.012.zip && wget -O fonts/SourceSans3.zip https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-sans/releases/download/3.052R/TTF-source-sans-3.052R.zip && unzip -o fonts/RobotoCondensed.zip -d fonts/RobotoCondensed && unzip -o fonts/SourceSans3.zip -d fonts/SourceSans3 && rm fonts/*.zip
